rows.label: bf08290150_0010
rows.name:
Your Majesty!
Yesterday, we sealed Section 47.

rows.label: bf08290150_0020
rows.name:
I see.
This is even faster than the surveys estimated.

rows.label: bf08290150_0030
rows.name:
Furthermore, we've detected surges of geothermal
energy in the royal precincts.

rows.label: bf08290150_0040
rows.name: So we can't hold out for long. Even here.

rows.label: bf08290150_0050
rows.name:
The ether flow is the lifeblood of the Divine Beast. The
temperature is increasing with its age.

rows.label: bf08290150_0060
rows.name:
Perhaps we should hasten moving
the capital to Gula.

rows.label: bf08290150_0070
rows.name: We've only just recalled the consul.

rows.label: bf08290150_0080
rows.name: And with no good explanation to the Gulan.

rows.label: bf08290150_0090
rows.name: We don't want to sow discord for no benefit.

rows.label: bf08290150_0100
rows.name: It's just, I fear time is running short...

rows.label: bf08290150_0110
rows.name: Indeed, but not only for us.

rows.label: bf08290150_0130
rows.name: But the harvests have been declining for years.

rows.label: bf08290150_0140
rows.name: It's like a cry issuing up from the center of the world.

rows.label: bf08290150_0180
rows.name:
My sister...
Where are you now?
